byline.original: By AL BAKER and KIRK SEMPLE

abstract: Authorities in Queens locate mother of baby abandoned in creche display in Church of the Holy Child Jesus but decline to press charges against her; mother's actions are protected under New York's Safe haven law.
lead_paragraph: Richard A. Brown, the Queens district attorney, said that the woman, whom he did not identify by name, had “followed the spirit of New York’s ‘Safe Haven’ Law.”

headline.main: Mother Who Left Baby at Queens Church Is Found; No Charges Will Be Filed
headline.print_headline: Mother Who Left Baby at Queens Church Is Found; No Charges Will Be Filed

snippet: Richard A. Brown, the Queens district attorney, said that the woman, whom he did not identify by name, had “followed the spirit of New York’s ‘Safe Haven’ Law.”
